title: Leftover turkey potato-topped pie
ingredients: ['250g leftover turkey, cut into pieces', '125ml leftover gravy', '120ml hot water', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'savoury seasoning to taste', '1 chicken stock cube (optional)', '1 carrot, sliced', '60g frozen garden peas', '1 small onion, chopped', '4 small potatoes, thinly sliced', '1 knob butter, melted', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
